title: Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain Save Corruption Gets New Details, Fix Soon
text: Konami has just provided customers with some more details about the pretty major glitch that affects Metal Gear Solid V: The Phantom Pain and causes the corruption of save game files. After confirming that it has to do with using Quiet as a buddy during specific missions, the studio mentions that only some specific items trigger the actual issue.
